column5: Hi folks:   Anyone out there know what it would approximately cost to fix a crankcase gasket leak and a gear shift that only works intermittently? I wanna bid on an older 25 HP  Evinrude motor on ebay but I need to get a handle on the costs...  thanks
Did you try to call an Evinrude dealer/service center?
SEND A PM TO POINTED!!!! PM ME IF YOU CANT REACH HIM AND LEAVE ME A NUMBER ILL GET HIM TO CALL YOU
There is the doityourself option as well if you get the shop manual its eaiser than you think

Split crank, clean with acetone and apply omc sealant....under $20.  Gear shift-often the rod itself rusts out on those engines-flexing instead of shifting causing that intermitent prob....is ebay seller local so you can have a look? If its violently jumping out of gear that's different, more $'s....clutch dog-possibly new gears.
